subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Seventh-seeded West Virginia used a virtuoso performance from Joe Alexander to upset second-seeded Duke, 73-67, in a game that wasn’t nearly as close as the final score suggested.
snippet: Seventh-seeded West Virginia used a virtuoso performance from Joe Alexander to upset second-seeded Duke, 73-67, in a game that wasn’t nearly as close as the final score suggested.
